mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.name AS "name", a.code AS "code", a.geo AS "geo", a.subway_id AS "subwayId", a.fee AS "fee", a.build_year AS "buildYear", a.plot_ratio AS "plotRatio", a.green_ratio AS "greenRatio", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.sort AS "sort", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a2.name AS "area.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a2 ON a2.id = a.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_smallarea( id, area_id, name, code, geo, subway_id, fee, build_year, plot_ratio, green_ratio, remarks, sort ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{area.id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{geo}, #{subwayId}, #{fee}, #{buildYear}, #{plotRatio}, #{greenRatio}, #{remarks}, #{sort} )
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_smallarea SET area_id = #{area.id}, name = #{name}, code = #{code}, geo = #{geo}, subway_id = #{subwayId}, fee = #{fee}, build_year = #{buildYear}, plot_ratio = #{plotRatio}, green_ratio = #{greenRatio}, remarks = #{remarks}, sort = #{sort} WHERE id = #{id}
